mapper.insert: merge into wish w using goods g on (w.goods_num = g.goods_num) when matched then update set w.wish_date = sysdate delete where w.goods_num = #{goodsNum} and w.member_num = #{memberNum} when not matched then insert (member_num, goods_num, wish_date) values (#{memberNum}, #{goodsNum}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select '200' from wish where goods_num = #{goodsNum} and member_num = #{memberNum}
select member_num, goods_num, wish_date from wish where member_num = #{memberNum}
